title: From drones to mobile apps, how is tech conserving nature? - Quora

response.answer_text: I'm not going to say tech is good for nature, however, global warming is bad for it, and tech is good at preventing global heating. Drones will probably direct birds away from wind turbines and mobile apps will probably connect the world wide super grid, insuring an uninterrupted supply of intermittent renewable energy, to be delivered at the speed of light from day to night and to be stored in Tesla's soon to be cheap and longer lasting batteries - politics willing.
